column5: Just curious as to what your all time hottest lure/technique is. Without a doubt mine would have to be trolled tots. Make mine gold with the flourescent orange back.
It has to be a jig tipped with a minnow or worm.......killer.

I have been going up to Ontario Canada for the last 12 years and the rig that has worked the best has been the Walleye harness. It works like a charm while doing a slow controled troll. Hope this will help. Good Luck.K-man
